suite.name: Signup

test.name: Não deve cadastrar com senha muito curta

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": false, "chromiumSandbox": false, "devtools": false, "handleSIGHUP": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "slowMo": 0.0, "timeout": 30000.0, "tracesDir": "C:\\QAx\\projects\\mark85-robot-express\\results\\browser\\traces\\acc1cd2b-1808-4322-b3bc-b216d5dc16eb"}

Successfully created browser with options: {"browser":"chromium","headless":false,"chromiumSandbox":false,"devtools":false,"handleSIGHUP":true,"handleSIGINT":true,"handleSIGTERM":true,"slowMo":0,"timeout":30000,"tracesDir":"C:\\QAx\\projects\\mark85-robot-express\\results\\browser\\traces\\acc1cd2b-1808-4322-b3bc-b216d5dc16eb"}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: http://localhost:3000
No context was open. New context was automatically opened when this page is created.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${user} = {'name': 'Wellington Júnior', 'email': 'wpsjunior23@gmail.com', 'password': '1'}

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${element} = css=h1

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.
kw.msg: Successfully opened URL http://localhost:3000/signup

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=h1 at state visible

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Text: 'Faça seu cadastro'

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Wellington Júnior' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'wpsjunior23@gmail.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text '1' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Alert should be
kw.arg: Informe uma senha com pelo menos 6 digitos

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=.alert-error >> text=Informe uma senha com pelo menos 6 digitos at state visible
